resources.string:
Umoja (Unity):
-Write and sing a song about the unity in school community.

Kujichagulia (Self-determination):
-Write books or read stories about determined people who achieved great goals.

Ujima (Collective Work & Responsibility):
-Make posters encouraging responsible behavior in the community. Plan a community service day for school.

Ujamaa(Cooperative Economics):
-Start a small business with your group in School. Work together to raise money. Use profits for the common good.

Nia (Purpose):
-Find and bring videos or story books to school. Choose stories where characters show strength of purpose. Discuss the videos or stories.

Kuumba (Creativity):
-Open an art gallery.

Imani (Faith):
-Have children of different faiths describe their beliefs. Invite clergy or other religious people to school.
